text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse The Americans are disgraced worse with this murdering than the Coronavirus. You are COMPLETELY finished as a president for November 2020 if you don’t apologize to the black community & rectify this, BIG TIME
WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING WARNING
